column2: "Hom yɛ EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn ne mba: mma hom mmbobɔ homho akam
column3: na mma hom nnyɛ hom momapɔw do ahyɛnsewdze mma ewufo."

column2: "Na ɔwo yɛ ɔman krɔnkrɔn ma EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn
column3: na EWURADZE asan mu eyi wo dɛ ebɛyɛ noara no soronko ɔman
column4: wɔ aman a wɔwɔ asaase enyi nyinara mu."

column2: "Mma nndzi ekyiwadze biara."
"Iyinom nye mbowa a hom ndzi: ɔnantwi
"Na abowa biara a ɔwɔ anansa a no mu apae
column3: na n’anansa no mu apae ebien koraa

column2: "Naaso iyinom na mma hom nndzi wɔ hɔn a wɔkosa adzepuwii mu
column3: anaa hɔn a hɔn anansa mu apae koraa mu: efupɔnkɔ
column6: osiandɛ wɔkosa adzepuwii dze na hɔn anansa mu mmpaae

column2: "na preko
column3: osiandɛ n’anansa mu apae dze na ɔnnkosa adzepuwii
column4: no ho nntsew mma hom: hɔn nam no mma hom nndzi bi
column5: na hɔn efun no mma hom nnka."

column2: "Iyinom na hom ndzi wɔ dza ɔwɔ nsu mu nyinara mu: dza ɔwɔ tɛterɛ nye abon no hom ndzi:"
"na biara a onnyi tɛterɛ nye abon no mma hom nndzi; no ho nntsew mma hom."
"Nnoma a hɔn ho tsew no nyinara hom ndzi."
"Na iyinom nye hɔn a mma hom nndzi bi: ɔkɔr
"nye ɔkom pɛtɛ
"nye akonkoran biara n’ahorow;"
"nye sohor
"patu ketseaba
"na nantwinoma
"nye esukɔnkɔn
"Na ntumbowa a wɔwea nyinara hɔn ho nntsew mma hom: mma wonndzi."
"Ntumbowa a hɔn ho tsew no nyinara hom ndzi."
"Mma hom nndzi biribi a noara oewu: fa ma ɔhɔho a ɔwɔ wo kuropon mu ma ondzi; anaa tɔn ma ɔnanaben: na ɔwo yɛ ɔman krɔnkrɔn ma EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn. Mma nnoa apɔnkyeba wɔ ne na no numfonsu mu."
"W’aba a idua no ndɔbaa a ofi wo haban mu ba afrenhyia afrenhyia no
"Na dzi wɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn enyim
column3: wɔ beebi mbrɛ ɔbɛsan mu eyi dɛ ne dzin ntsena hɔ no
column6: nye wo ngo do ebupɛn du du
column8: nye wo nguankuw mu mbakan; ama eesua dɛ isuro EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dabaa."

column2: "Na sɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn hyira wo na sɛ ɔkwan no war dodow ma wo ma irunntum nnsoa
column3: osiandɛ beebi mbrɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn asan mu eyi dɛ ɔdze ne dzin bɔto no nye wo ntamu twe dodow
column7: na kɔ beebi mbrɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn asan mu eyi no."

column2: "Fa sika no tɔ adze biara a wo kra no kɔn dɔ
column7: anaa adze biara a wo kra pɛ no: na dzi no wɔ hɔ ara wo EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn enyim

column2: "na Levinyi a ɔwɔ wo kuropon mu no
column3: mma nngya no ekyir; osiandɛ onnyi kyɛfa nye egyapadze ka wo ho."

column2: "Mfe ebiasa biara n’ewiei no
column3: yiyi afe no ara mu ndɔbaa do ebupɛn du du no nyinara
column4: na fa gu wo kuropon mu:"

column2: "na Levinyi
column3: osiandɛ onnyi kyɛfa nye egyapadze biara dɛ mbrɛ ewɔ
column6: nye okunafo a wɔwɔ wo kuropon mu
column8: na wombedzidzi mmee; na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn eehyira wo wɔ wo nsaano edwuma a eyɛ nyinara mu."
